## DocumentReplica.setActor() method

`setActor` sets actor into this document. This is also applied in the local changes the document has.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setActor(actorID: ActorID): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  actorID | [ActorID](./yorkie-js-sdk.actorid.md) |  |

void
